## Section 2 Day 2 Tasks

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

## Finding Derivatives in R

example 1

```{r}
fx = expression(x ^ 2)
x = 3
df_dx = D(fx,'x')
df_dx
slope = eval(df_dx)
slope
```

next example

```{r}
Pa = expression(2*((3*a + 2)^4) - 5)
a = 1.2
dP_da = D(Pa,'a')
dP_da
slope = eval(dP_da)
slope
```
